title.rendered: “Unveiling Terror Finance: IDF Reveals Evidence of Iran’s Financial Support to Hamas in Khan Younis Tunnel Discovery”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Attached are the materials presented in the IDF spokesperson’s update, Brigadier General Daniel Hagari, about intelligence findings found in the underground tunnel in Khan Younis.

Attached is documentation found inside a tunnel where large sums of terrorist money were found: https://bit.ly/3Oy5EIQ

Images from the tunnel are attached: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC934765

Attached are documents that document the transfer of money from Iran to Hamas: https://bit.ly/3SNmMwz

Pictures of documents that document the transfer of money from Iran to Hamas are attached: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC9345689756

Pictures of money envelopes that were transferred to the Hamas leader, Yahya Sinwar, are attached: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC3478956
